Name: Relief of Queen Ankh-ni-nefer-ka-Re, Amun-Re, and Ptah
Description: This relief shows Queen Ankh-ni-nefer-ka-Re followed by an attendant who shakes a sistrum, or rattle, which was the favored musical instrument of the goddess Hathor. Amun-Re is seated and the god Ptah, Lord of Memphis, is standing behind him, holding the composite scepter and wearing a skullcap with a solar disk.
